name: Custom Post Ads
author: Vikas Ratudi

sections.description:
Welcome to the Custom post ads design your custom ads in a few minutes.

This will help you customer to reach new pages or sites.

You can easily create you custom ad.

In this Custom post ads you can easily set your post to a perticular category.

Features

  • Easy To use
  • Add Action
  • Make Active or Inactive
  • Toggle Page or post
  • Change Call to Action
  • Add Image
  • Create Sponsored section
  • Select Post Category
  • Visible before, after or both
  • Customize width & height

Notes

Custom Post Ads is absolutely free, positively the most beginner friendly for WordPress. It is both easy and powerful.

Please feel free to follow me on Instagram for latest updates: Follow.

If you have any suggestion/query just email us at:) vforminfo@gmail.com.
sections.faq:
Who should use Custom post ads?

Any one who want to show their custom ads in their post or page.

Can i ask for a addon feature?

Yes, Ofcourse please Contact us at vforminfo@gmail.com

What should I do when I experience any problem?

Contact us at vforminfo@gmail.com
